title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 176.2 - Revocation of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 176.2 - Revocation of permits

State Regulations

The Industrial Commissioner may revoke a permit for either
of the following reasons: (a) the
making of false material statements in the application for the
permit; (b) the occurrence of
incidents, or the existence of circumstances related to the employment of women
during the specified hours which are detrimental to the health and welfare of
such women. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
176.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
